item.title: Should I Learn Julia?
item.author: thomas@tiveron.ca (Thomas Tiveron)
item.description: Why Julia, Why Now? Programming is a diverse field! You have people from all around the world, tackling every sort of problem imaginable with their computers. From web-developers, to mobile app creators, from legacy code maintainers, to scientific computing mathematicians, many people need different features and different languages. Julia is a relatively young language, released in 2012, and was designed to meet the high-performance needs of numerical and scientific programming; while being a general-purpose programming language.
